Congratulations! You've earned the maxim: Congratulations! You've earned the maximum of ${ rewardsLimit } free months of ${ plusPlanName }.

A recovery file lets you unlock and view: A recovery file lets you unlock and view your data after an account reset.
Use the following credentials when conne: Use the following credentials when connecting to ${ VPN_APP_NAME } servers without application. Example use cases include: Tunnelblick on macOS, OpenVPN on GNU/Linux.

Keeps you protected by blocking all netw: Keeps you protected by blocking all network connections when you are unexpectedly disconnected from our VPN server.
One VPN connection allows one device to: One VPN connection allows one device to connect to Proton VPN at any given time. For instance, to connect a phone and a laptop to Proton VPN at the same time, you need two VPN connections.
